short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables "ink skipping" in links (text-decoration-skip-ink) for more legible underlining.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension restores the underlining behavior of previous Chrome versions, making underlining much more legible (for some users in some languages).  If you find it hard to read text with broken solid-dashed-dotted lines showing up underneath, this extension is for you!

Note: Similar to another existing, outdated extension, but:
• Works on more pages
• Does not inject any JavaScript (less performance impact and does not crash on certain pages)

Extension source code available here: https://github.com/Jimbly/better-ink-skip
